Package io.github.upendramanike.observability

Class StructuredLogger

java.lang.Object
io.github.upendramanike.observability.StructuredLogger
public class StructuredLogger extends Object
Structured logging utility that automatically includes correlation IDs and other context in log messages. Designed for JSON log aggregation systems.

Example usage: 


 StructuredLogger logger = StructuredLogger.forClass(MyService.class);
 logger.info("User action", Map.of("userId", "123", "action", "login"));

Output (when using JSON layout): 


 {
   "level": "INFO",
   "message": "User action",
   "correlationId": "abc-123",
   "userId": "123",
   "action": "login"
 }
